text: Thompson Twins were an English alternative rock band formed in 1977. The group disbanded in May 1993. They were successful in having three top ten hits in the US.All Music Guide to Rock: The Definitive Guide to Rock, Pop, and Soul, eds. Vladimir Bogdanov; Chris Woodstra; Stephen Thomas Erlewine (San Francisco, CA: Backbeat Books, 2002), p. 1137 When the group did not move past their Synthpop sound they lost their popularity. Through most of their career there were three members. However none were twins and none were named Thompson.Michael Anderson, The Ultimate 80's Music Book (Raleigh, NC: Lulu Publishing, 2008), p. 96 ==Discography== ;Studio albums * A Product Of... (Participation) (1981) * Set (1982) * Quick Step and Side Kick (1983) * Into the Gap (1984) * Here's to Future Days (1985) * Close to the Bone (1987) * Big Trash (1989) * Queer (1991) == References == Category:1977 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:1993 disestablishments in the United Kingdom Category:Musical groups established in 1977 Category:Musical groups disestablished in 1993
title: Thompson Twins
